assets.changelog:
###    🚀 新功能

- **Account**:
  - 账户系统  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(a2d54)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/a2d54d1c)
- **Comp**:
  - 支持从 CurseForge 下载世界并自动安装  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1185 [<samp>(8fb08)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/8fb08cb2)
  - 收藏夹加入世界资源分类  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1245 [<samp>(333f2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/333f2ab9)
- **Export**:
  - 支持导出光影配置文件  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(07a2e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/07a2ebb8)
- **Link**:
  - 用户输入错误的房间号时给予友好提示  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(5f34d)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5f34d86a)
  - 支持加入陶瓦的联机房间  -  by @Pigeon0v0 and @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1182 [<samp>(2c54a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/2c54abc0)
  - 更新 EasyTier 到 2.4.0 并支持 ACL  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1225 [<samp>(bf0cf)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/bf0cf68e)
  - 更新 EasyTier 至 2.4.1  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1247 [<samp>(c6904)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c6904880)
- **LocalComp**:
  - 自动识别资源包图标  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1204 [<samp>(e55eb)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e55eb8c7)
- **MyCheckBox**:
  - 复选框的三态  -  by @Hill23333 and @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1246 [<samp>(5282c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5282c4f9)
- **Net**:
  - 将 CacheCow 缓存应用于部分网络请求  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(e0334)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e033499c)
- **PageInstance**:
  - 实例启动次数统计和查看  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1239 [<samp>(cd315)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/cd315844)
- **PageOtherTest**:
  - 加入PCL游戏启动次数显示  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1224 [<samp>(4f176)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/4f17623b)
- **Theme**:
  - 支持自定义灰阶配置  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1193 [<samp>(c67ab)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c67abfc8)

###    🐛 修复

- 硬件调查弹窗异常弹出  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(42d7a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/42d7a4f6)
- **CompMod**:
  - 模组启动和禁用会导致模组列表项目缺失内容  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(d6f53)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d6f5382e)
- **CompResource**:
  - 修复文件夹排序和打开逻辑  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1170 [<samp>(45c62)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/45c62a43)
  - 修复启动器全选收藏和分享所选Bug  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1200 [<samp>(ed473)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/ed47316d)
  - 修复模组禁用/启用列表项目缺失  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1215 [<samp>(1a6ff)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/1a6ff0b2)
  - 修复下载页面搜索框有几率不显示  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1234 [<samp>(90d21)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/90d212ba)
  - 无法进行一些批量操作  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(6f9c4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6f9c45b2)
- **Crash**:
  - 修复错误报告导出中启动器日志命名不正确的问题  -  by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1178 [<samp>(9c1d5)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9c1d549a)
- **Launch**:
  - 游戏参数没有被正确替换（未同步上游更新）  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(3bd1a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/3bd1a9b5)
  - Build error  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(ae0cf)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/ae0cf0b8)
  - 游戏启动参数传递错误  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(c10b6)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c10b67a0)
  - 启动计数统计可能会有 null 异常  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(9f9db)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9f9db02b)
- **Link**:
  - Natayark 账户登录可能由于回调服务端没有正确启动而失败  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(8f0f4)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/8f0f4712)
  - 快速从联机页面点入设置会导致 Natayark 账号登录失效  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(407bd)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/407bdf43)
  - 输入错误的房间号时不应该进入大厅界面  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(9b389)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9b389b08)
  - 可能找不到局域网广播信息  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(fd8e3)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/fd8e3022)
  - 直接与 Minecraft 通信而不是局域网广播  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(54a89)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/54a89d2b)
  - 使用 Process.WaitForExit 而不是 Thread.Sleep 等待输出结果  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(8b4e3)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/8b4e3f58)
  - 登录失败会报错  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(d9ea8)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d9ea837d)
- **McPing**:
  - 遇到不回复的端口会无限制等待的问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(9b6e2)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/9b6e25f7)
- **ModProfile**:
  - 修复在启动游戏前切换档案会导致档案没切过来  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1208 [<samp>(5ca17)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5ca174f1)
- **PageInstance**:
  - 修复实例选择按钮点击后页面跳转顺序问题  -  by @caomei269 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1217 [<samp>(cf25c)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/cf25cd57)
- **PageOtherTest**:
  - 瞅眼服务器的默认图标没有展示  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(c816b)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c816b08e)
- **Profile**:
  - 再次尝试解决正版登录可能的弹窗问题  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(c7c7a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/c7c7a251)
  - 档案页面意外的切换回原来选择的档案  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(49884)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/49884ca4)
  - 加载离线皮肤时的 UUID 错误  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(009d8)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/009d89c0)
  - 切换档案失败  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(5b54e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/5b54ef7e)
- **SavesInfo**:
  - 修复1.4版本以下存档信息获取出错  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1210 [<samp>(2cbb5)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/2cbb5320)
- **Sort**:
  - 错误地执行了刷新整个 UI 导致卡顿  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(094f9)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/094f9c10)
- **Theme**:
  - 修复窗体加载初期的 MyButton 空指针异常  -  by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1209 [<samp>(d7389)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/d7389303)
- **smtc**:
  - 无法正确传递媒体信息  -  by @Hill23333 [<samp>(7b75a)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/7b75a0be)
- **uvmc**:
  - 修复错误的下载地址  -  by @zkitefly in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1226 [<samp>(65be9)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/65be9923)

###    ⚡ 性能优化

- **CompResource**:
  - 优化模组排序性能  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1228 [<samp>(e1b85)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e1b8532b)
  - 对模组文件信息缓存的更多应用  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1237 [<samp>(08e02)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/08e02ccc)
  - RawPath是对的，使用HashSet代替List  -  by @pynickle and @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1240 [<samp>(6c336)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6c3363e4)

###    🛠️ 改进

- **PageLoginMs**: 隐藏不可用的返回按钮  -  by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1222 [<samp>(e6a9f)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/e6a9f23f)

###    🔧 重构

- **Net**: 换用自实现的 HTTP 缓存存储，同时加入缓存压缩减少空间占用  -  by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/issues/1241 [<samp>(dc550)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/dc550f9a)

###    🏡 杂项

- **Java**: 代码样式小改动  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(bf0a1)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/bf0a17e0)
- **Profile**: 加入更多的标志以方便错误跟踪  -  by @tangge233 [<samp>(6a28e)</samp>](https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/commit/6a28e2fa)
